abstract.description: Is the behavior abstract (i.e. can not be associated with any work item type)

overridden.description: Is the behavior overrides a behavior from system process

Control.description: Represent a control in the form.

height.description: Height of the control, for html controls.

id.description: The id for the layout node.

inherited.description: A value indicating whether this layout node has been inherited from a parent layout.  This is expected to only be only set by the combiner.

isContribution.description: A value indicating if the layout node is contribution or not.

overridden.description: A value indicating whether this layout node has been overridden by a child layout.

readOnly.description: A value indicating if the control is readonly.

visible.description: A value indicating if the control should be hidden or not.

Extension.description: Represents the extensions part of the layout

pickList.description: Reference to picklist in this field

pages.description: Top level tabs of the layout.

Group.description: Represent a group in the form that holds controls in it.

controls.description: Controls to be put in the group.

id.description: The id for the layout node.

inherited.description: A value indicating whether this layout node has been inherited from a parent layout.  This is expected to only be only set by the combiner.

isContribution.description: A value indicating if the layout node is contribution are not.

order.description: Order in which the group should appear in the section.

overridden.description: A value indicating whether this layout node has been overridden by a child layout.

visible.description: A value indicating if the group should be hidden or not.

id.description: The id for the layout node.

inherited.description: A value indicating whether this layout node has been inherited from a parent layout.  This is expected to only be only set by the combiner.

isContribution.description: A value indicating if the layout node is contribution are not.

locked.description: A value indicating whether any user operations are permitted on this page and the contents of this page

order.description: Order in which the page should appear in the layout.

overridden.description: A value indicating whether this layout node has been overridden by a child layout.

visible.description: A value indicating if the page should be hidden or not.

isSuggested.description: Is input values by user only limited to suggested values

Section.description: A layout node holding groups together in a page

id.description: The id for the layout node.

overridden.description: A value indicating whether this layout node has been overridden by a child layout.

VssJsonCollectionWrapper.description: This class is used to serialized collections as a single JSON object on the wire, to avoid serializing JSON arrays directly to the client, which can be a security hole

inputs.description: A dictionary holding key value pairs for contribution inputs.

showOnDeletedWorkItem.description: A value indicating if the contribution should be show on deleted workItem.

id.description: The ID of the reference behavior

url.description: The url of the reference behavior

order.description: Order in which state should appear
Order in which state should appear

behaviors.description: Behaviors of the work item type

class.description: Class of the work item type

color.description: Color of the work item type

description.description: Description of the work item type

icon.description: Icon of the work item type

id.description: The ID of the work item type

inherits.description: Parent WIT Id/Internal ReferenceName that it inherits from

layout.description: Layout of the work item type

name.description: Name of the work item type

states.description: States of the work item type

url.description: Url of the work item type

color.description: Color of the work item type

description.description: Description of the work item type

icon.description: Icon of the work item type

isDisabled.description: Is the workitem type to be disabled

api-Version-preview.1.name: api-version
api-Version-preview.1.description: Version of the API to use.  This should be set to '4.1-preview.1' to use this version of the api.

accessToken.description: Personal access token. Use any value for the user name and the token as the password.
